availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Henry Jasper Eulett (Lewis County, Kentucky, farmer.)

body.p: Lewis County, Kentucky, farmer. Lewis County, Kentucky, native. Son of John Eulett and Susan Lee Eulett. Married to Pheby Bloomfield in Lewis County, Kentucky, on October 10, 1861. Father of Mary Eulett and Emory Eulett. Resident of Lewis County in 1850. Stonemason in Lewis County. Resident of Lewis County in 1861.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Lewis County, District 1, p. 236A.
Ninth Manuscript Census of the United States (1870), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Lewis County, Laurel Precinct, p. 474B-475A.
Kentucky Birth, Marriage and Death Records (1852-1910), KDLA, Frankfort, KY, Roll 994045, Lewis County Marriages.
Kentucky Death Certificates, 1911-1965, Kentucky Office of Vital Statistics, KDLA, Frankfort, KY, File 7016135.
Lewis County Historical Society, Pioneer Families of Lewis County, Kentucky, Indexed, (Mt. Vernon, IN: Windmill Publications, 1996), 57-58.
